transform-any-text-into-natural-emotiona: Transform any text into natural, emotionally expressive speech with AI-powered voice cloning.
indextts2-zero-shot-text-to-speech-with-: IndexTTS2: Zero-shot text-to-speech with emotion control and voice cloning. Supports Chinese and English with high emotional expressiveness.
target-text-to-synthesize-into-speech: Target text to synthesize into speech
voice-timbre-reference-audio-for-speaker: Voice timbre reference audio (for speaker cloning)
emotion-control-method-speaker-same-as-v: Emotion control method: speaker (same as voice), reference (use emo_audio), vector (use emo sliders), text (use emo_text)
emotional-reference-audio-used-when-emo_: Emotional reference audio (used when emo_control_mode is 'reference')
emotion-intensity-weight-0-0-1-0-recomme: Emotion intensity weight (0.0-1.0, recommended 0.6-0.7 for text mode)
emotion-description-text-used-when-emo_c: Emotion description text (used when emo_control_mode is 'text')
enable-random-sampling-reduces-voice-clo: Enable random sampling (reduces voice cloning fidelity but adds variety)
maximum-generation-tokens-audio-may-be-t: Maximum generation tokens (audio may be truncated if too small)
sampling-temperature-higher-more-diverse: Sampling temperature (higher = more diverse, lower = more stable)
maximum-tokens-per-sentence-segment-80-2: Maximum tokens per sentence segment (80-200 recommended)
synthesize-speech-from-srt-subtitle-file: Synthesize speech from SRT subtitle files with timing synchronization. Automatically generates audio aligned with subtitle timestamps.
extract-a-25-second-audio-segment-from-t: Extract a 25-second audio segment from the input audio file to use as reference for voice synthesis or cloning. Automatically detects and extracts vocal parts.
input-audio-file-to-extract-reference-fr: Input audio file to extract reference from
automatically-detect-and-extract-vocal-s: Automatically detect and extract vocal segments (default: true)
start-time-in-seconds-used-when-auto_det: Start time in seconds (used when auto_detect_vocal is false, default: 0)
